price: (25) He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīnin
